en.metaDescriptionText: Early Buddhist texts and modern translations. Suttas (sutras) from the Tipitaka (Tripitaka) in Pali, Chinese, Sanskrit, and Tibetan with the Buddha's teachings on mindfulness, insight, wisdom, and meditation.
en.metaKeywords: Buddha, Buddhism, Buddhist, sutta, sutra, tipitaka, tripitaka, wisdom, teaching, mindfulness, meditation, scripture, canon, Pali, Sanskrit, Tibetan, Chinese, insight, vipassana
